====== Hamburger Template ======



===== About =====
''hamburger'' {{:combostrap:icons:hamburger.svg|}} is a [[template|template]] that show only these three layers:
  * the [[:docs:theme:element:page-header|page header]]
  * the [[docs:theme:element:main|main (header, content and footer)]]
  * the [[:docs:theme:element:page-footer|page footer]]


The hamburger is the default layout for any admin page.


There is no [[:docs:theme:element:page-side|page side (sidebar)]].
